name: LeKiosk
overview:
Service lekiosk provide you with hundreds of french, UK and more international titles for you to read in digital format.

Available as of the first day of publication, you can enjoy your magazines on any devices you want, including iPad, iPhone, Android tablets and mobiles, and any computers.

The service has had 0.5 million download of the application since its launch in January 2011 on the iPad.

They have close to 600 press titles in their catalog: Public, Grazia, L’Express, Les Inrocks, Le Point, Marianne, Le Figaro Magazine, Le Nouvel Obs, Challenges, Be, Paris Match, VSD, Management GQ, Vogue, Marie Claire, Glamour, Entrevue, Cosmopolitan, Elle… ; Lekiosk has 120 publishing company as partners;

Lekiosk is a mobile service, providing

  • Online reading by stream;
  • Offline reading by downloading;
  • Constitution of a virtual library;
  • Unlimited storage magazines;
  • An archive of all previous issues;
  • One-click buying system; Purchase magazines by issue or via formulas: 10 magazines for £9,99 per month

funding_rounds.source_description: LeKiosk Books Another $7.1M For Its Online Store, As It Strives To Become The ‘Spotify Of Magazines’
